+map {MAP} +set name "{NAME}" +set sv_hostname "{ROOMNAME}" {PASSWORD} + set net_port {PORT} +set sv_maxclients {MAXPLAYERS} +set fraglimit {GOALSCORE} +set timelimit {TIMELIMIT} +set g_gametype {GAMEMODE}

+map {MAP} +set name "{NAME}" +set sv_hostname "{ROOMNAME}" {PASSWORD} + set net_port {PORT} +set sv_maxclients {MAXPLAYERS} +set scr_{GAMEMODE}_scorelimit {GOALSCORE} +set scr_{GAMEMODE}_timelimit {TIMELIMIT} +set cl_playintro 0 +set ui_skip_titlescreen 1 +set ui_skip_legalscreen 1 +set g_gametype {GAMEMODE}
